body:
I care about characters. I want to build characters, and then have stories emerge from their interactions organically.

Part of that are recurring villains. But who's to say today's villain can't be tomorrow's companion?

To keep track of all these relationships, I could draw a 2D or 3D graph. Each character could be represented by a portrait, which is a generalisation of multiplayer model icons that can be dynamically generated from a mini scene (but probably also gets cached as an image). Basically saved photo mode settings. (#23) This would tie into character creation, which would work the same for player characters and NPCs. Give players custom profile pictures.
title: relationship system
